{"step_by_step_thinking": "MTA stands for Mineral Trioxide Aggregate. It is a material used in dentistry for endodontic therapy. The setting expansion refers to the increase in volume that occurs when the material sets. According to the literature, the setting expansion of grey MTA when mixed with water is approximately 0.2%. However, this exact value is not given in the options. The closest value to this is 0.12%.", "answer_choice": "B"}
